c7574a1c-cc8c-4f7d-8c54-65dca23f2eef.description: This certification is designed to ensure that a Genesys Partner has associates with the knowledge necessary to support the use of Genesys Cloud. Genesys certifications lead to higher quality performance, recognized credibility, and greater customer success.
c7574a1c-cc8c-4f7d-8c54-65dca23f2eef.name: Cloud Certified Partner

badge_template_activities.title: CCP: Introduction to Genesys Cloud: Provides general information on the CCP program, describes the primary types of Genesys and Genesys Cloud reference resources, high-level overview of the Genesys Cloud Services, and summary of Genesys Cloud licensing, and the methods available for accessing Genesys Cloud.

CCP: Genesys Cloud Collaborate & Communicate +Lab: Provides concepts, configuration, and management of the primary features of the Genesys Cloud Collaboration and Communication Services. This lab guide is designed to complement the course content provided in the CCP: Genesys Cloud Collaborate & Communicate course.  Each lab provides you with the opportunity to experience the primary configurations discussed in the associated chapter(s) of the CCP (Cloud Certified Partner) course.

CCP: Genesys Cloud Contact Center +Lab: Provides concepts, configuration, and management of the primary features of the Genesys Cloud Genesys Cloud Contact Center services. This lab guide is designed to complement the course content provided in the CCCP: Genesys Cloud Contact Center course.  Each lab provides you with the opportunity to experience the primary configurations discussed in the associated chapter(s) of this CCP (Cloud Certified Partner) course.

CCP: Genesys Cloud API +Lab: Provides the basic concepts of Application Programming Interfaces (API), REST APIs, the Genesys Cloud-specific APIs, and the OAuth standard that Genesys uses to authorize the use of the APIs.  The course also discusses the Software Development Kit (SDKs) and  Genesys Cloud’s Developer Tools useful for testing a Genesys Cloud environment’s API endpoints.

The Cloud Certified Partner (CCP) certification exam is designed to assess a candidate's knowledge of the Genesys Cloud services and validate their understanding of the general operations of those services and the management of the features of those services.  This certification is also used to test their knowledge in the terminology used in Genesys Cloud.

e0dbcff6-90ed-4535-91fe-bf5dcc81c014.description: The Interaction Optimizer Certified Administrator certification (IOCA) is for those that are responsible for configuring CIC system for implementation, forecasting workload, creating schedules, managing real-time operational performance, and schedule adherence. Gain exposure to the Real-Time Adherence module in Interaction Center Business Manager.

badge_template_activities.title: Genesys Design Thinking Explorer
Genesys Design Thinking Practitioner

Completion of the Genesys Design Thinking Coach Curricula, consisting of over 50 hours of group learning and individual mentor sessions. Group sessions include: An Introduction to Design Thinking at Genesys, Design Thinking Activities and Techniques, How to Design a Workshop, How to Plan a Workshop, Tools & Resources, The Art of Facilitation, Day-to-Day Design Thinking, and Assembling Your Course Package
Assisting in the facilitation of three outcomes-based workshops
Planning and leading the facilitation of three outcomes-based workshops
Submission of the Coach Package documentation demonstrating the outcomes achieved using Genesys Design Thinking
